targets.rawSql: SELECT Device_Locate FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT Device_Life FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Battery_Temp
FROM UPS_A
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Time_Stamp)
ORDER BY Time_Stamp
SELECT Battery_Charge_Mode FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT Battery_Status FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT Battery_Health FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Input_Line
FROM UPS_A
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Time_Stamp)
ORDER BY Time_Stamp
SELECT System_Mode FROM UPS_A ORDER BY Time_Stamp DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Input_Volt
FROM UPS_A
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Time_Stamp)
ORDER BY Time_Stamp

SELECT
  Time_Stamp AS "time",

FROM UPS_A
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Time_Stamp)
ORDER BY Time_Stamp

SELECT

ORDER BY Time_Stamp

SELECT

panels.content: <font color=gray size=7> 上次更換電池日期 : </font>
panels.title: UPS_A-Battery-LastChange_Date

targets.rawSql:

  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Battery_Last_Change_Year
FROM UPS_A
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Time_Stamp)
ORDER BY Time_Stamp

  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Battery_Last_Change_Mon
FROM UPS_A

ORDER BY Time_Stamp

SELECT
  Time_Stamp AS "time",
  Battery_Last_Change_Day
FROM UPS_A
WHERE

ORDER BY Time_Stamp
